title: Piers Morgan reacts strongly as Candace Owens podcast sparks outrage over Erika Kirk jokes and Charlie Kirk theories
summary_full: Piers Morgan condemned Candace Owens and Bassem Youssef after comments about Erika Kirk sparked backlash online. The remarks followed a podcast discussion that questioned her behavior during a leaked Zoom call. Morgan called the jokes cruel and unsupported by facts. He continues to challenge Owens to prove her claims or publicly retract them.
